title: Council Directive 95/212/EC of 29 May 1995 concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Austria)
header:
COUNCIL  DIRECTIVE
of 29 May 1995
concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the  meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Austria)
(95/212/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN  UNION
main_body: The areas situated in the Republic of Austria which appear in Annexes  I, II and III shall form part of the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the  meaning of Article 3 (3), (4) and (5) of Directive 72/268/EEC.
This Directive is addressed to the Republic of Austria.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1995.
For the Council
The President
Ph. VASSEUR
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.  Directive as last amended by the 1994 Act of Accession.
(2) OJ No C 125, 22. 5. 1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ No C 126, 22. 5. 1995.
